SEARCH
Package org.savingapp.service

Class BudgetServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.savingapp.service.BudgetServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BudgetService
@Service public class BudgetServiceImpl extends Object implements BudgetService
Represents a budget service that handles business logic for budgets. Implements BudgetService to provide methods for CRUD operations on budgets.
